physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features four women. All of them are sitting down. Some of them are looking at one another while others are looking towards the direction in which the photograph was captured. A large tree can be seen in the background. 'Straits born chinawomen' is stated at the bottom.
sgcool_label_text: This photograph shows four Peranakan women in baju panjang and batik sarongs seated at the foot of a tree. The caption ‘Straits born chinawomen’ is printed beneath the photograph.
title_text: Photograph of four Peranakan women seated at foot of tree
subject_terms_1: group portraits women (female humans) Peranakan folk costume
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Women Ethnic costume Peranakan (Asian people) Portraits, Group
